Reviews.Title: Nice camera - even for beginners
Reviews.Author: Mary Raines
Reviews.Content: This is the first "real" camera I've used (have previously only used a Sony point and shoot model.)  So far I haven't used too many of the settings, but the pictures I've taken have come out fantastic.  I took it to Epcot for the Flower and Garden festival this spring and the pictures are amazing and I can totally see the difference from pictures taken last year with my point and shoot.  I also have a new baby boy and I love the photos I can take of him.  You can take multiple pictures in quick succession which is important with a little one.  The vendor I purchased this from thru Amazon was also very helpful when I emailed and called with questions on how to attach extra lenses, etc.  You can also purchase instructional DVDs on Amazon (a beginner level and advanced level) to help you learn how to use it.  My husband just got those for me and I look forward to learning more about my camera.

Reviews.Title: Incomplete
Reviews.Author: Lorena
Reviews.Content: This kit doesn't include the lens. You have to buy the lens separately. Withot the lens you can't use the kit.

Reviews.Title: Awesome value

Reviews.Content: After much research, I found this to be the best package at the best price that I could find.  My daughter was thrilled with all the extras!

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: I really love my camera. I've had it for about a year now and I am really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Camara Bien, Accesorios regular

Reviews.Content: La camara y el lente original esta muy bien, los accesorios que venian no son de buena calidad, no me gustaron el flash, el tripode, el maletin.
